name: Drop Preserve
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 92

You are a slime who wakes up in an unknown castle for unknown reasons. Quickly getting trapped in a 30 second timeloop, you must ascend to escape.

Controls -

WASD to move

Click to use item in inventory (or interact with things)

R to restart level (not in game yet)

(webgl soon maybe)
